name: Peter The Giraffe
description:
A little story about Peter, a giraffe who lives in a small town, where his friend invites him to his house to try his new experiment. Along the way, Peter will meet unique characters, some in trouble, and Peter can help them by stretching his neck. 

This game was created for Tu Juego a juicio jam 2021 in two weeks. 

Music from looperman.com

-Super Clean Melody by djkhaledsson

-Reminds my of  Ujico by Kojv
